sources.title: Forbidden Area
sources.description: Title: "Playhouse 90" Forbidden Area Summary: Why are so many B-99 bombers from Hibiscus Air Base crashing or simply disappearing? Colonel Price comes up with a terrifying explanation, but will anyone believe him? Directed by: John Frankenheimer Actors: Charlton Heston, Tab Hunter, Diana Lynn Production Company: Playhouse 90 Release Date: Episode aired 4 October 1956 Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 Why are so many B-99 bombers from Hibiscus Air Base crashing or simply disappearing? Colonel Price comes up with a terrifying explanation, but will anyone believe him?
